shortDescription: Improper Input Validation in Hitron Systems DVR HVR-4781 1.03~4.02 allows an attacker to cause network attack in case of using defalut admin ID/PW.
vulnerabilityName: hitron_systems dvr_hvr-4781 Use of Hard-coded Credentials
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
